Setting.name: Service Action
Setting.Description: The options for the Evaluation > Action Required field

Setting.name: Service Charge To
Setting.Description: The default options for the Primary Charge To field
Setting.Default: Customer Deliverer EW FYW Internal Supplier

Setting.name: Service Location
Setting.Description: The options for the location where the service will take place

Setting.name: Service Part Month
Setting.Description: Month options for specifying Supplier Contractual Costs matrix

Setting.name: Service Questions
Setting.Description: Script questions for service evaluation
Setting.Default: 1) Have you read the instruction manual? 2) Is the item under warranty? 3) Is the item in use domestically? 4) Was the item installed by qualified personnel? 5) Has the item been moved from the delivery address?

Setting.name: Fault tag
Setting.Description: Options for Fault Tags that the technician can specify. These can then be used to search/report on

Setting.name: Service Reassign Technician Reasons
Setting.Description: Reasons for re-assigning a service request to another technician
Setting.Default: Customer not comfortabl wt tech Customer migrated another area Part availability taking too long Technician taking too long Vehicle cannot go in area

Setting.name: Service Reject Technician Reasons
Setting.Description: Reasons why a technician is rejecting a job

Setting.name: Job Rejection Limit in Days
Setting.Description: Maximum number of days before a job that a technician can reject the job

Setting.name: Service Technician Category
Setting.Description: Categories for which the technician can do jobs

Setting.name: Service Repair Type
Setting.Description: The type of repair - this will be used to calculate charges

Setting.name: Service Reason For Exchange
Setting.Description: The reason why an item that is BER is being replaced
Setting.Default: Electrical Defect Hardware Mechanical Defect Rusting Structure

Setting.name: Service Retailer
Setting.Description: Retailers show as options when creating an External service request

Setting.name: Default Stock Location Branch
Setting.Description: The Branch number used as default value for the Stock Location Branch inside the Matching Stock dialog.

Setting.name: Service BER Limit
Setting.Description: The percentage of the original Cost Price that when exceeded means the product is probably beyond economic repair (BER)

Setting.name: Service BER Replacement
Setting.Description: When ticked this will allow products beyond economic repair to be instantly replaced

Setting.name: Service BER Markup
Setting.Description: This is the percentage of the costprice of the item which is BER that will be applied to the costprice when calculating the courts parts total

Setting.name: Service Stock Account
Setting.Description: The special account number for the service parts inventory

Setting.name: Service Installation Stock Account
Setting.Description: The special account number for the service installation parts inventory

Setting.name: Show Warranty Availability on Statement
Setting.Description: When ticked 'Warranty Available' label will be visible on SR Printouts

Setting.name: Installation Account Electrical
Setting.Description: The special account number for Electrical Installations

Setting.name: Installation Account Furniture
Setting.Description: The special account number for Furniture Installations

Setting.name: Previous Repair Cost Warning Percentage
Setting.Description: The percentage of cost price above which there should be a warning to tell the user that the previous repairs exceeded this amount.
